title: Chainlink External Adapter for querying Terra view functions
description: This external adapter allows querying contracts on the Terra blockchain. A list of public endpoints can be found [here](https://docs.terra.money/Reference/endpoints.html). Please only use these for testing, not in production, as they are not secure.

COLUMBUS_5_LCD_URL.description: The URL to a Terra `columbus-5` full node to query on-chain mainnet data

BOMBAY_12_LCD_URL.description: The URL to a Terra `bombay-12` full node to query on-chain testnet data

LOCALTERRA_LCD_URL.description: The URL to a locally running Terra full node to query on-chain data

DEFAULT_CHAIN_ID.description: The default `chainId` value to use as an input parameter
